document_data.caption: A map of Gnarhelm showing Sunderstaad in the northeast.
document_data.name: Sunderstaad
document_data.mainbody: '''Sunderstaad''' was a small town located in the kingdom of [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Sunderstaad was located on the coast of the [[Sea of Swords]] in northeast Gnarhelm near [[Lake Sunder]]. It was the northernmost settlement found in Gnarhelm. The town was situated on a small unnamed bay.
